DeliveryStream.Name: AWS::KinesisFirehose::DeliveryStream
DeliveryStream.Description: A name for the delivery stream.An Amazon ES destination for the delivery stream.An Amazon Redshift destination for the delivery stream.An Amazon S3 destination for the delivery stream.
DeliveryStream.Required: Conditional. You must specify only one destination configuration.
DeliveryStream.UpdateRequires: No interruption. If you change the delivery stream destination from an Amazon S3 destination to an Amazon ES destination, update requires some interruptions.
